goal.en: Let student learn the basic theoretical models of molecular spectrosocpy and how to apply these theories to pratical problems
goal.ch: 讓學生學習基本分子光譜學理論並了解在實際研究問題上的應用

content.en:
“This course will introduce the theoretical models and experimental methods of molecular spectroscopy and will cover the following subjects:
1. Quantum Mechanical Models for Rotational Spectroscopy, Vibrational Spectroscopy, and Electronic Spectroscopy
2. Selection Rules in Spectroscopy
3. Symmetry Applications in Spectroscopy (Group Theory)
4. Modern Experimental Methods“
content.ch:
“本課程將介紹分子光譜學之基本理論與實驗方法主要內容
1. Quantum Mechanical Models for Rotational Spectroscopy, Vibrational Spectroscopy, and Electronic Spectroscopy
2. Selection Rules in Spectroscopy
3. Symmetry Applications in Spectroscopy (Group Theory)
4. Modern Experimental Methods“

textbook.en: “Suggested Reference Books: 1. P. F. Bernath, ““Spectra of Atoms and Molecules““ 2. F. A. Cotton, ““Chemical Applications of Group Theory““ 3. J. D. Graybeal, ““Molecular Spectroscopy““ 4. G. Herzberg, ““Molecular Spectra and Molecular Structure““, Vol. I, II, and III“
textbook.ch: “建議參考書目: 1. P. F. Bernath, ““Spectra of Atoms and Molecules““ 2. F. A. Cotton, ““Chemical Applications of Group Theory““ 3. J. D. Graybeal, ““Molecular Spectroscopy““ 4. G. Herzberg, ““Molecular Spectra and Molecular Structure““, Vol. I, II, and III“

grading.ch: “期中考 Midterm 40％ 期末考 Final 50％ 學習精神 Attendance 10％“
